Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2011 02:17PM lorij44 wrote: I gained 25lbs in just two weeks after finishing taxotere treatments.  I could hardly walk from the extra water weight and could not wear any of my regular shoes to work. I had to get compression hose,and my insurance covered a walker that I had to use for about a month. I was put on a diuretic but it dropped my blood pressure so low I ended up in the emergency room. Anyway, I lost 12 lbs fairly quickly, but have been struggling since January 2011 with the other 13.  I've always been fairly small framed so I shouldn't complain but it really makes me angry sometimes that I have to work at losing the last of the weight.
Posts.Title: WEIGHT GAIN tanya01 tanya01
